trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola has the look of a woman satisfied with her work.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_01<tab>Not long after you and your comrades notify the Forum of your mission's success, Y'shtola receives a linkpearl call from Nidhana, who informs her that a great feast will be held in Radz-at-Han to celebrate Azdaja's homecoming. The members of your party are naturally invited, but before you can make your way to Thavnair, you must deliver the memoria crystal containing Zeromus's aether to your friends in the First.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving in the Crystarium, you present yourself to the sentry at the Dossal Gate. The man directs you to the Ocular while he goes to find Lyna and Beq Lugg.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_03<tab>While they were already well aware of your triumph, your friends are no less happy to hear your personal account, having been glad to play a role in protecting the Source. They are further delighted and intrigued when you entrust to them the memoria crystal and explain Zero's idea of using it to restore balance to the First. While there is no telling if it will be possible, Beq Lugg and Ryne resolve to do their utmost to try.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_04<tab>Lyna had faith that you would be victorious in the end, and she is equally certain that the people of Norvrandt will cheer when they learn the Warrior of Darkness managed to save <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home. She assures you that they will continue the work they've begun, and so secure in the knowledge that the fortunes of the First will surely improve, you return to the Source that you may join the celebration in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive in time to partake of a sumptuous feast at Mehryde's Meyhane. Having had your fill, you step aside for a moment's respite and find Estinien doing likewise. The dragoon takes the opportunity to inquire as to your future plans, and when you struggle to answer, he assures you that you will know when the time is right. The two of you are then joined by Y'shtola, who muses that her coming days will be spent compiling theories on cross-rift travel. But when she turns to ask after Estinien's plans, you find that he has already silently taken his leave─as is his wont.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_06<tab>Y'shtola thanks you for everything you've learned and accomplished─to have been a part of something so momentous─before taking her leave. Alone once more, you heed her suggestion and make your way to Meghaduta, there to call on Vrtra.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_07<tab>You find Vrtra in the form of Varshahn, who explains that he has assumed the guise to readily escort his sister Azdaja about Radz-at-Han. Long has he dreamed of showing her his beautiful city, a glittering jewel born of unity, and he intends to relish every moment of it. The happiness in his words warms your heart, and fills your breast with pride for the part you played in reuniting siblings separated across worlds and millennia. And though Darkness yet reigns in the void, the spark of hope has been rekindled, instilling you with faith that, one day, life-giving Light will shine there once more.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Crystarium gatekeep at the Dossal Gate.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Crystarium gatekeep at the Dossal Gate.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Lyna.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the accommodating official at Meghaduta.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_05<tab>Head for Meghaduta.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ESTINIEN_000_001<tab>If I didn't know better, I'd say father dearest is warming to us. I've no interest in sipping tea at the family estate again, though. Drinks at the tavern, on the other hand...

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_005<tab>Although Master Louisoix hath left us, he liveth on in his teachings. 'Tis gratifying to see that Master Fourchenault, too, hath come to acknowledge the wisdom in them.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I look forward to telling my father of our efforts in Garlemald. He will have sage counsel to offer, I'm sure.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>You're of course welcome at our home─Mother, for one, would be thrilled to have you─but I won't twist your arm if you have other matters to attend to.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ATHELEYS_000_018<tab>If I heard correctly, it seems you've saved the world yet again!
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>With that, our obligations here are concluded.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>Oh, Nidhana. What news from Thavnair?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>They've returned, then? Wonderful. Rest assured all is well with us too.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_023<tab>...Is that so?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab>We would be honored, of course. I shall relay this to the others.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>A great feast will be held in Radz-at-Han to celebrate Azdaja's homecoming. We have all been invited.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALPHINAUD_000_026<tab>I'm afraid my sister and I must decline. We have only just returned home; to leave again so soon would be inconsiderate to our parents.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_027<tab>With regret, I too must excuse myself from attendance. A prior commitment requireth that I remain in Sharlayan for a time.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_028<tab>Let not our absence deter you, however. Pray enjoy yourselves to the fullest.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ESTINIEN_000_029<tab>I've no plans in particular, so you can count me in. I may as well visit the Radiant Host while I'm there.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>How about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_A1_000_001<tab>Far be it from me to turn down free food!
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_A1_000_002<tab>I have a delivery to make to the First.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>That's the spirit.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>Ah, but what about the memoria crystal? 'Twould be remiss of us not to deliver it promptly to our friends in the First.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_034<tab>Ah, of course. The memoria crystal. 'Twould be remiss of us not to deliver it promptly to our friends.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_100_034<tab>Also, if they are to transfer Light and Dark between worlds, they will need command over the Crystal Tower.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>In which case, I shall give you my spirit vessel to take again. When you arrive in the Crystarium, the sentry at the tower should be able to round up everyone for you.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_036<tab>Once you have seen to matters there, come and join us at Meghaduta.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALISAIE_000_037<tab>Give everyone our regards, you hear?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_100<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Mistress Ryne is still in the Ocular. Will you be joining her?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Enter the Ocular?
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_102<tab>Very good. If you would care to head inside, I shall send for Captain Lyna and Beq Lugg at once.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_BEQLUGG_000_105<tab>For so long I was loath to trust in others, fearful of my research being misused again. That it may serve noble ends comes as a relief. I shall spare no effort to restore balance between Light and Dark!
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_RYNE_000_110<tab>A brighter tomorrow awaits. Zero's Light will shine the way.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_RYNE_000_115<tab>Hmm... If I had Gaia's help, I wonder if I could take in Darkness the same way Zero took in Light...
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_200<tab>It was a mighty struggle, but I had faith that you would be victorious in the end.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_201<tab>And I doubt not that the people of Norvrandt will cheer when they learn that the Warrior of Darkness managed to save <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_203<tab>I know you are a busy <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, so don't let us keep you. Rest assured that we will continue the work we've begun.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_205<tab>If the Crystal Tower is to be used for research, it may be prudent to bolster its security.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_100_205<tab>It is the Exarch's legacy, and we must spare no effort to keep it safe.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_300<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you honor us with your presence!
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_301<tab>Though I am but a humble servant, I offer you my heartfelt thanks for rescuing the satrap's beloved sister.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_302<tab>But without further ado, the great feast to celebrate this joyous occasion is about to begin! The venue is Mehryde's Meyhane, and you are a guest of honor!
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_400<tab>'Twas a lively feast, was it not? And it impressed upon me once again how dear Vrtra is to his people.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_401<tab>Well, as much as I should like to linger, 'tis past time I took my leave. If you mean to depart as well, I suggest you call on Vrtra before setting out.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_402<tab>And before I forget─thank you. For everything we learned, and for everything we accomplished, I couldn't be more grateful.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_403<tab>Till next time, take care.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_AZDAJA_000_405<tab>Vrtra's friend... I thank thee.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>Azdaja regards you with keen interest.

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_500<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I hope you enjoyed the festivities. To be able to celebrate Azdaja's return with everyone was...moving beyond words.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_501<tab>Lest you wonder, I've chosen to use this vessel for now, the better to escort my sister about Radz-at-Han.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_502<tab>This leaves my true form without an eye, but I do not anticipate having need of it in the immediate future.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_503<tab>Long have I dreamed of showing Azdaja my beautiful city, a glittering jewel born of unity. And I shall relish every moment of it.
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_505<tab>Now then, I believe both Y'shtola and Estinien have embarked on their respective journeys, but have you yourself business elsewhere?

TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_506<tab>If not, you are welcome to remain here as long as you like. Should aught of import arise, we will inform you─but until such a day arrives, I bid you take your ease.
